job_history.work_description: Maintain general ledger to include the preparation of journal entries, coding of invoices, accounts analysis and reconciliation, closing books monthly, balance sheet and income statement reconciliations. Responsible of the AR and AP processes and the timely collection of receivables and resolution of issues/discrepancies. File 1096 and 1099's forms and reports with government agencies annually. Perform general accounting and other related duties in the daily administration of Accounting department. Perform bank reconciliation monthly, verify all deposits, and address questions and problems from banking institutions. Prepares weekly cash activities and monthly cash flows forecast to help the upper management team with financial budget planning. Reports and bank reconciliations; uses online banking tools to ensure accurate report preparation and timely identification of exception items, as necessary. Assist in preparation of monthly financial reports to include preparation of monthly balance sheet and income statement. Prepare timecards for company payroll and other temporary agencies. Maintain and set up new customers/vendors accounts.

Validate and process Warranty/Royalty claim accounts for payment requests. Update and maintain inventory standard cost for all divisions. Reconcile travel expense reports and prepare check request for reimbursement. Prepare shipments cutoff tests for month end closing. Interact with internal and external clients, vendors, partners and other key stakeholders. Apply best practices in credit and collections to meet business needs and objectives. Reconcile commercial & military customer accounts. Contact customers to collect overdue accounts. Report the reasons for late payments and escalate within the organization to help achieve a timely resolution. Reconcile account receivables/inter-company sales and prepare journal entries for month end closing.

Maintain general ledger to include the preparation of journal entries, coding of invoices, accounts analysis and reconciliation, closing books monthly, balance sheet and income statement reconciliations. Responsible of the AR and AP processes and the timely collection of receivables and resolution of issues/discrepancies. File 1096 and 1099's forms and reports with government agencies annually. Perform general accounting and other related duties in the daily administration of Accounting department. Perform bank reconciliation monthly, verify all deposits, and address questions and problems from banking institutions. Prepares weekly cash activities and monthly cash flows forecast to help the upper management team with financial budget planning. Reports and bank reconciliations; uses online banking tools to ensure accurate report preparation and timely identification of exception items, as necessary. Assist in preparation of monthly financial reports to include preparation of monthly balance sheet and income statement. Prepare timecards for company payroll and other temporary agencies. Maintain and set up new customers/vendors accounts.

Worked directly with controller in preparation for monthly and yearly financial statements. Assisted all the accounting field such as Accounts Payable, Accounts Receivable, Prepaid accounts. Bank Reconciliation for monthly, quarterly, and year end. Assisted on cash collection.

skills.name: General Accounting
skills.explanation: Over 15 years of experience in general accounting, including journal entries, accounts analysis, and reconciliation, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Financial Reconciliation
skills.explanation: Extensive experience with bank reconciliations, balance sheet, and income statement reconciliations, showing expert-level proficiency.

skills.name: Payroll Management
skills.explanation: Handled payroll-related tasks, including timecards and temporary agencies, suggesting strong proficiency in payroll management.

skills.name: Accounts Payable
skills.explanation: Responsible for AP processes, including coding of invoices and resolution of issues/discrepancies, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Accounts Receivable
skills.explanation: Handled AR processes, including timely collection of receivables and resolution of issues/discrepancies, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Budgeting
skills.explanation: Assisted in preparation of monthly financial reports and cash flows forecast, showing a solid working proficiency in budgeting.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: No direct leadership roles mentioned, but experience working with internal and external clients, vendors, and partners, indicating some practical experience in leadership.

skills.name: Microsoft Excel
skills.explanation: Likely used extensively for managing financial records and reports, suggesting strong proficiency in Microsoft Excel.

skills.name: Cash Management
skills.explanation: Handled cash-related tasks, including weekly cash activities and monthly cash flows forecast, indicating strong proficiency in cash management.

skills.name: Inventory Management
skills.explanation: Updated and maintained inventory standard cost for all divisions, showing a solid working proficiency in inventory management.
